name: Artificial Adventure
description:
Welcome to "Artificial Adventure", a point-and-click puzzle game where you guide a robot on a quest to explore a mysterious world full of puzzles and challenges. What makes this game unique is that all the art and dialog, as well as text descriptions, have been created by AI.
  -Chatgpt

For this game jam I wanted to try and create a game with all content made entirely with AI. It was originally going to just be 2d but it was hard fit different generated content together. The background art, items art, dialog and description text, music, as well as some code use AI. The only real thing not created by AI in the game is most of the coding and the 3d robot.

To fit things together I ended up going with a classic 2.5 pre-rendered background style that games like alone in the dark and resident evil 1 that used  back before computer hardware was powerful enough to render everything. That way all the different camera angles in the AI generated content wouldn't be a problem.

The game uses 2 active cameras with invisible meshes are being used that still write to the z-index allowing the background to render over the player, and allows for pathfinding in the scenes. And special shaders were setup to also catch the shadows from the player while still being invisible.
